text: U me ji li bal Musa da (aha) niqandiye: "Tu ji gopale xwe baveje." Idi (ji pisti gava Musa ku gopale xwe avetiye) gopale (Musa) ewa (peseyen anckaran) digirt, (ya ji ewan meze kirin, ku gopale Mesa ewan tisten ewan aloze kiribune, li ser wan da xwe bi lez daveje, ewan ancen) wan kiri, heman wunda dibin
